title: Municipal Constitutional Commission
body: On July 5, 1834, the members of the governance gathered at the Town Hall to elect a commission to replace the appointed councilors during the usurpation. The elected citizens were as follows: Luiz Teixeira Doria, president, Valentim Leal, vice-president, João Francisco de Florença, Luiz de Ornelas e Vasconcelos, and Tristão Joaquim Bettencourt da Camara. The functions of this commission lasted until October 20, 1834.

Luiz Teixeira Doria: President of the Municipal Constitutional Commission
Valentim Leal: Vice-president of the Municipal Constitutional Commission
João Francisco de Florença: Member of the Municipal Constitutional Commission
Luiz de Ornelas e Vasconcelos: Member of the Municipal Constitutional Commission
Tristão Joaquim Bettencourt da Camara: Member of the Municipal Constitutional Commission

5 de Julho de 1834: Meeting for the election of the Municipal Constitutional Commission
20 de Outubro de 1834: End of the functions of the Municipal Constitutional Commission
